snippet.title: World of Goo 2 - Reveal Trailer | Game Awards 2023
snippet.description:
World of Goo is back! Check out the reveal trailer of World of Goo 2, from 2D Boy and the Tomorrow Corporation. 15 years after the release of the original game, World of Goo 2 comes back in 2024 with more puzzles, and more Goo.

#ign #gaming #thegameawards
